parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The inaccurate speedometer reading can cause the rider to misjudge their speed, leading to potential accidents or traffic violations.
symptoms: The speedometer displays an incorrect speed
often lower than the actual speed.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrical system can cause the engine to stall, leading to a loss of power and potential accidents.
symptoms: the electronic speedometer and display go blank

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the starter can cause the engine to fail to start, leaving the rider stranded.
The failure of the transmission gear fork can cause the transmission to lock up, leading to loss of control, accidents, and damage to the transmission.
symptoms: grinding noise when shifting into gear

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Unavailability of Spare Parts for Speedometer Repair
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unavailability of spare parts for speedometer repair can lead to prolonged downtime of the vehicle, causing inconvenience to the owner and potentially affecting safety if the speedometer is not functioning properly.
symptoms: the motorcycle is inoperable due to a faulty speedometer
the owner is unable to obtain the necessary parts for repair
conflicting information from the manufacturer and dealer regarding part availability.
